text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: For strategy——I'd like to go with "Chaser".

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: Blow……them away?

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
……thank you very much for agreeing. 
Well then, your other instructions——

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
I see, just like that genius trainer, go along with her. 
But, wouldn't that just make you a lesser copy?

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
Right here!! 
3rd Sword, The Flight of Olivier. Yaaaaaaaaa!!

The result——another overwhelming victory. She really 
is on a completely different level. Even with only a 
few instructions, she responded with unrivaled sharpness.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
I've safely returned after my triumph. 
Please share with me this glory.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: Eh……? Okay……
choice_data_list: I've never seen anything like it!

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
——I-I'm honored. However, I don't believe 
it's something to be that overjoyed about……

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer C
text_block_list.text:
Aah～ah, getting that excited. 
Just like a child.

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer C
text_block_list.text:
And even that genius trainer couldn't form a contract with her. 
In that case, that person too……

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: Um……I apologize, but……

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
Once more……could I ask for a little bit more of your time? 
I want to try talking a bit more, with you.

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer C
text_block_list.text: O-oh……? This is the first time that's happened……

At Durandal's invitation, I was meeting 
her at a certain place on my day off.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
If we're having a conversation, it has to be here. 
Please, make yourself at home.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
……when it comes to Holy Knights, it has to be the church, right? 
I'm very particular when it comes to places where I can be myself.

Now that I thought about it, I'd been wondering 
this whole time so I figured I'd try asking now.
choice_data_list: You're not really a Holy Knight, right?
You're not really a Holy Knight, right?

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
……Unfortunately, no. 
But I am a knight. My heart is that of a knight……!

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: It's been my aspiration since I was small.

text_block_list.name: King Charlemagne
text_block_list.text:
Roland, well done. 
Your performance this time was truly magnificent.

text_block_list.name: Holy Knight Roland
text_block_list.text:
I'm honored to receive your praise. 
My sword exists——solely for the King.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
Offering their sword only to the King they respect. 
And thus——living to the fullest.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
And someday, I wanted to be like those knights 
I saw in fairy tales…… And then one day——

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
My older sister entered a race. And she won…… 
And her trainer, gave praise to her just like the King.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
A truly ideal connection. And my admiration only became stronger. 
I wanted to try living as a knight in the Racing World.
choice_data_list: So that's what you want to do……
So that's what you want to do……

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: Perhaps……it's a bit of a childish aspiration……
choice_data_list: That's not true. I think it's wonderful!

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: Wonderful…… is a bit of an exaggeration……

It was the same as how I was following after my senpai. 
I wanted to fully support Durandal's dream.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
(This person……has a lot of energy…… But they're not all talk. 
In the previous race, they properly helped me win……)

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
(But, when it comes to winning, that trainer that is called a genius 
did too. And when it comes to experience, they must have more……)

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
(But even then……why is it that I'm 
much more interested in this person?)

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: (Is it just……my own misunderstanding? To confirm this——)

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
My temporary King. 
I have a request.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
Together with me, will you take on another challenge? 
——For another more arduous race.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
Yes. I want to prove myself against a strong opponent. 
And to see if you——truly are the King I should offer my sword to.

Only during fierce battle can one's true 
caliber be measured. My own, and Durandal's too.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
Then, let us head to the battlefield together. 
And then——

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
We'll understand it all. 
Just who we are, and what we are to each other.
